name: Levi, Finland
description: Levi Ski Resort, nestled in Finnish Lapland, is Finland’s largest and most popular winter sports destination. It offers 44 slopes, 26 lifts, and over 230 km of cross-country trails. Levi is known for its snow reliability, its long skiing season and family-friendly atmosphere. Levi hosts the annual Alpine Skiing World Cup and boasts vibrant après-ski and eco-friendly operations.
